headline: Is News Corp (NWSA) Undervalued After Its Recent Share Price Slide? A Fresh Look at Valuation
summary: News (NWSA) has drifted lower in recent months even as revenue and net income continue to grow. This naturally raises a valuation question for investors watching a long term total return that remains comfortably positive. See our latest analysis for News. At around $26.10, the recent slide in News share price, including a weaker 90 day share price return, contrasts with its strong three and five year total shareholder returns. This suggests longer term momentum is intact even as short term...
